Settings.LogDebugHint: Enables verbose logging to the console for debugging
Settings.EnableApplyDamageHint: Adds an 'Apply Damage' button to damage rolls

DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateDamageApplyHint: Automatically apply damage to targeted token when damage is rolled.
DCC-QOL.SettingTakeDamageManualHint: Display a reminder message when damage needs to be applied manually.
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateDeedDieRollHint: Automatically roll and display deed die results for warrior and dwarf attacks.
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateFriendlyFireHint: When firing into melee and missing, automatically check for friendly fire (50% chance).
DCC-QOL.SettingFiringIntoMeleePenaltyHint: Automatically apply -1 penalty when firing a missile weapon into melee.
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateMonsterCritLuckHint: Automatically adjust monster critical hits based on target's Luck modifier.
DCC-QOL.SettingDisplayHitMissHint: Show whether an attack hits or misses on the chat card.
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateLuckyWeaponModifierHint: How to apply lucky weapon modifiers for Warriors and Dwarves.
DCC-QOL.SettingWeaponRangeCheckHint: Check weapon range and apply appropriate penalties based on distance.
DCC-QOL.SettingLogHint: Output debug information to the browser console.
